channel.title: Auto save When u log out?
channel.description: How do you make it auto save when you log out... Cuz on my server when some1 dies they log out on purpose so they can get their stuff back, im getting really frustrated with it. Please someone help ;) ty ~fishys[br][size=1]Posted on: October 08, 2007, 01:35:59 PM[/size][hr]ne1? :/
